title: Product Page — Widget 3000
text: Widget 3000 is our flagship product. It ships with a 2-year warranty. Key specs: 12-inch display, 4-core CPU, 128GB storage. Use the SKU W3000 when ordering.

title: Support KB — Refunds
text: Refunds are processed within 5 business days. Customers must provide an order number and a reason. If the product is damaged, include photos. For subscription refunds, prorated amounts apply.

title: Integration Guide — API Keys
text: To call our API, include an Authorization header with your API key. Rate limit is 60 requests per minute. Use the /v1/endpoint path and always include json content-type.
